AavePoolGetReserveNormalizedIncomeReturn.details: getReserveNormalizedIncome() returned zero for underlying asset. Oracle only supports active Aave-V2 assets.

NotEnoughFunds(uint256,uint256).details: There are not enough funds available for the requested operation

PositionNetZero().details: No need to unwind a net zero position

PositionNotSettled().details: Position must be settled after AMM has reached maturity

WithdrawalExceedsCurrentMargin().details: We can't withdraw more margin than we have

lpNotionalCaps.details: Voltz Protocol marginEngine => LP Notional Cap in Underlying TokensLP notional cap of zero implies no notional cap

params._marginEngine: MarginEngine for which to get the lp cap in underlying tokens

lpNotionalCaps.return: Notional Cap for liquidity providers that mint or burn via periphery (enforced in the core if isAlpha is set to true)

returns._0: Notional Cap for liquidity providers that mint or burn via periphery (enforced in the core if isAlpha is set to true)

lpNotionalCumulatives.details: amount of notional (coming from the periphery) in terms of underlying tokens taken up by LPs in a given MarginEngine

params._marginEngine: MarginEngine for which to get the lp notional cumulative in underlying tokens

lpNotionalCumulatives.return: Total amount of notional supplied by the LPs to a given _marginEngine via the periphery

returns._0: Total amount of notional supplied by the LPs to a given _marginEngine via the periphery

CannotLiquidate().notice: The position/trader needs to be below the liquidation threshold to be liquidated

CannotSettleBeforeMaturity().notice: Positions and Traders cannot be settled before the applicable interest rate swap has matured

OnlyOwnerCanUpdatePosition().notice: Only the position/trade owner can update the LP/Trader margin

PRBMathSD59x18__FromIntOverflow(int256).notice: Emitted when converting a basic integer to the fixed-point format overflows SD59x18.

PRBMathSD59x18__FromIntUnderflow(int256).notice: Emitted when converting a basic integer to the fixed-point format underflows SD59x18.

PRBMathSD59x18__MulInputTooSmall().notice: Emitted when one of the inputs is MIN_SD59x18.

PRBMathSD59x18__MulOverflow(uint256).notice: Emitted when the intermediary absolute result overflows SD59x18.

PRBMathUD60x18__Exp2InputTooBig(uint256).notice: Emitted when the input is greater than 192.

PRBMathUD60x18__FromUintOverflow(uint256.notice: Emitted when converting a basic integer to the fixed-point format format overflows UD60x18.

PRBMathUD60x18__LogInputTooSmall(uint256.notice: Emitted when the input is less than 1.
